snippet: Stony Brook gave up game tying home runs in the ninth, 10th and 11th innings on Friday before a thrilling N.C.A.A. tournament game was postponed because of rain.
abstract: College Baseball Roundup; Louisiana State hits tying home runs in the ninth, 10th and 11th innings prolonging a thrilling NCAA tournament game against the upstart Stony Brook long enough for a downpour to postpone it with tie scored at 4-4; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Stony Brook gave up game tying home runs in the ninth, 10th and 11th innings on Friday before a thrilling N.C.A.A. tournament game was postponed because of rain.

headline.seo: Stony Brook Loses Leads to L.S.U. Before Rain Delay
headline.main: Stony Brook Loses Leads, Then Waits
headline.print_headline: Stony Brook Loses Leads, Then Waits

keywords.value: State University of New York at Stony Brook
